channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: The United States Cannot Go It Alone in Venezuela
item.description: Decisive U.S. action in Venezuela has showcased U.S. power but risks provoking long-term resistance from adversaries, hedging by partners, and anxiety among allies. Without coalition-building and post-crisis leadership, short-term success could erode U.S. influence.

item.title: The Last U.S. Hunger Data: What We Lose with the Termination of the USDA’s Household Food Security in the United States Report
item.description: The USDA’s latest Household Food Security in the United States report shows that food insecurity rose for a third consecutive year, with 13.7 percent of households food insecure in 2024. The USDA plans to terminate the report after 30 years of consistent, national assessments.

item.title: Is a Weakened CS3D Still Too Much?
item.description: Bill Reinsch and Michael Gary unpack the critical questions around the European Union's Corporate Sustainability Due Diligence Directive (CS3D).
